text: Genyorchis macrantha is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to Cameroon. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical dry forests. == Sources == * Cheek, M. & Cable, S. 2000. Genyorchis macrantha. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. macrantha Category:Endemic orchids of Cameroon Category:Vulnerable flora of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Genyorchis macrantha
